original_text: The Israelites had agreed a sign with their men who were hiding. When those men ran into Gibeah and they destroyed everything there, they would make the sign. They would light a big fire so that the smoke went up into the sky.
korean_text: 처음에 이스라엘 사람과 복병 사이에 약속하기를 성읍에서 큰 연기가 치솟는 것으로 군호를 삼자 하고

sentences.original_text: The Israelites had agreed a sign
with their men who were hiding
When those men ran into Gibeah

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 거기 모든 것을 파괴했습니다

sentences.original_text: They would light a big fire
so that the smoke went up into the sky
